summary: This document is a stipulation for the electronic storage of instruments and documents related to a loan. It outlines the agreement of the borrowers to allow their documents to be stored electronically and acknowledges that the originals will be destroyed. The stipulation indicates that electronic images will serve as originals in legal proceedings.
keyFacts: The document pertains to Loan Number 420361321.
Borrowers agree to the electronic storage of all documents related to the loan.
Original documents will be destroyed upon electronic imaging.
Printed reproductions of electronically stored documents can be used in legal proceedings.
Fifth Third Bank is mentioned as entitled to enforce the paper instrument at the time of destruction.
